Question
========

Suppose the probability of the birth of a boy in a family is 0.498 and we assume that the birth of each child is an independent event is. If a family has three children, what is the probability of two boys and one girl (in any order)?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,124
* 0,498
* 0,333
* 0,373
* 0,502

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.124: Incorrect
* 0.498: Incorrect
* 0.333: Incorrect
* 0.373: Correct
* 0.502: Incorrect
